resources.string: choose preferences for the books length
Preferences for the gender of the main character?

Readers often go through the struggle of looking for new books, and so they start looking at every resource they can. Yet, many of the books wont fit them. "Book Smart" builds you a personalized list of recommendations, so you wont have to. we start with a few questions, and then build your list and profile. we welcome in open arms feedback, and let you search for books/authors out of the list.
